entry.title: WIND WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: ENE 74 km/h gust 86 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:20 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 80 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:20 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
